title: How to Two Hand Tap on Guitar Hero

steps.headline: Go to "My Name is Jonas" in Practice mode, do the Intro (My Name Is Intro), in Slowest.
Try two handed, you need to hit the first note then you need to move your strumming hand quickly over to some of the frets and help you other hand out.
Try making you strumming hit one note, like the Orange Note.
steps.description: master that then try doing it with an extra note, until your strumming hand has 3 notes to do.

steps.headline: Master that then go to "Slower", then go to "Slow", then "Full Speed"
Get up to "Full speed" go into "QuickPlay" (or Career mode) and play the song, if you can Master The "Intro", "Outro" And "Solo" then your ready for something harder.
Go to practice Mode again and do the Intro (They're Hammer-ons) of Through the Fire And Flames, do it in "Slowest", then "Slower", then "slow" then "Full speed", just like in "My Name is Jonas".
Just do that trick with any song with a big "Hammer-on" or "Pull-off" Solo and you will get better at them.

text: Go to "My Name is Jonas" in Practice mode, do the Intro (My Name Is Intro), in Slowest. Now tap It One Handed. Try two handed, you need to hit the first note then you need to move your strumming hand quickly over to some of the frets and help you other hand out.  Try making you strumming hit one note, like the Orange Note. master that then try doing it with an extra note, until your strumming hand has 3 notes to do. Master that then go to "Slower", then go to "Slow", then "Full Speed"  Get up to "Full speed" go into "QuickPlay" (or Career mode) and play the song, if you can Master The "Intro", "Outro" And "Solo" then your ready for something harder.  Go to practice Mode again and do the Intro (They're Hammer-ons) of Through the Fire And Flames, do it in "Slowest", then "Slower", then "slow" then "Full speed", just like in "My Name is Jonas".  Just do that trick with any song with a big "Hammer-on" or "Pull-off" Solo and you will get better at them.
